pullrequest.title: Upgrade to ign-cmake2 and fix bionic build warnings

content.raw:
FYI @mxgrey 

I believe this is to fix the following warning from gcc8 on bionic

~~~
In file included from include/ignition/common/PluginMacros.hh:22,
                 from test/plugins/DummyPlugins.cc:18:
test/plugins/DummyPlugins.cc: In function ‘std::size_t IGNCOMMONMultiPluginInfo(void**, std::size_t, std::size_t)’:
include/ignition/common/detail/PluginMacros.hh:100:77: warning: type qualifiers ignored on cast result type [-Wignored-qualifiers]
         reinterpret_cast<ignition::common::PluginInfo * * const>(_outputInfo); \
                                                                             ^
include/ignition/common/PluginMacros.hh:110:3: note: in expansion of macro ‘DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS’
   DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS
   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/plugins/DummyPlugins.cc:82:1: note: in expansion of macro ‘IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS’
 IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS
 ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~
content.html:
FYI @mxgrey

I believe this is to fix the following warning from gcc8 on bionic

In file included from include/ignition/common/PluginMacros.hh:22,
                 from test/plugins/DummyPlugins.cc:18:
test/plugins/DummyPlugins.cc: In function ‘std::size_t IGNCOMMONMultiPluginInfo(void**, std::size_t, std::size_t)’:
include/ignition/common/detail/PluginMacros.hh:100:77: warning: type qualifiers ignored on cast result type [-Wignored-qualifiers]
         reinterpret_cast<ignition::common::PluginInfo * * const>(_outputInfo); \
                                                                             ^
include/ignition/common/PluginMacros.hh:110:3: note: in expansion of macro ‘DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS’
   DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS
   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
test/plugins/DummyPlugins.cc:82:1: note: in expansion of macro ‘IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS’
 IGN_COMMON_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS
 ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

content.raw:
Do we need this `ifdef` anymore? The tinyxml2 version shipped in `Bionic` is `6.0.0`. Related question: Should we also remove the custom copy of tinyxml2?

There’s a cppcheck style warning in this block.
content.html:
Do we need this ifdef anymore? The tinyxml2 version shipped in Bionic is 6.0.0. Related question: Should we also remove the custom copy of tinyxml2?

There’s a cppcheck style warning in this block.
